channel.title: AWS on Julia Furst Morgado
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Julia Furst Morgado

item.title: Setting up a Kubernetes cluster on AWS EKS with eksctl and Deploying an App
item.description: It might come as a surprise, but not too long ago, configuring a Kubernetes cluster on Amazon EKS was quite challenging since you had to create all the components manually by yourself.

item.title: Deploy Your First Web App on AWS with AWS Amplify, Lambda, DynamoDB and API Gateway
item.description: Hey there! If you’ve decided to learn more about AWS, then you’ve landed on the right blog post!

item.title: The Ultimate eSports Experience: Inside the AWS VALORANT Champions VIP Hospitality 2023
item.description: If you think Los Angeles is only about Hollywood celebrities and palm trees, think again.

item.title: Secure Your AWS Environments with Terraform, Vault, and Veeam
item.description: I’m thrilled to present the first post in my blog series focused on optimizing cloud infrastructure management, data security, and backup automation in your AWS environment.

item.title: A Technical Deep Dive into Veeam Backup for AWS
item.description: Introduction Veeam Backup for AWS introduces advanced backup protection for Amazon Web Services (AWS) environments.

item.title: Expand Your Blog's Reach with this AWS Automation Tool
item.description: Hurrah!! If you’re reading this post on Hashnode or Dev.to it means it worked!

item.title: Build a Website with HUGO on AWS Amplify
item.description: Learn how to build a static site with Hugo and deploy it on AWS Amplify. This is a detailed tutorial to help you start from scratch!
